steps: Combine tofu, lemon juice, parsley, dill, red onion, garlic, salt, pepper, rice vinegar, and chia seeds in a bowl. Mix well and refrigerate for at least 5-10 minutes (quick chill while pasta cooks) or 30+ minutes ahead of time to let flavors meld. Remove from fridge and stir before using.
Cook chickpea pasta in salted boiling water for 8 minutes.
Drain canned chickpeas and mash with a fork. Add chopped celery and shredded carrots to the bowl.
Drain cooked pasta and rinse with cold water.
In a hot pan, add peas, then pasta on top and mix. Fold in the chickpea mixture and chilled dressing. Combine thoroughly and serve.
title: Protein Packed Chickpea Pasta
